clients.title: Make Your Mark: Create a Homepage to Impress Visitors & Search Engines
description: Your homepage is the most important page on your law firm website. It is typically the strongest page for the most competitive search queries and can have a direct impact on the visibility of your site in Google organic and Google My Business / Google Map search results. At a minimum, we recommend the following for your homepage:

• At least 1,000 words of high-quality and original information
  • Information about your core practice areas or services, offset by descriptive headings
  • A variety of keyword phrases that include the words lawyer(s), attorney(s), or law firm, as well as your main location and key practice areas
If you have questions about the best practices for writing homepages, don't hesitate to reach out to us.

jld.title: Complete Your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile
description: Our data shows that lawyers who complete their profiles in our directory receive 76 times more client contacts than those with incomplete profiles. We suggest adding a professional photo, short biography, updating contact information, participating in Ask a Lawyer, and connecting your profile to your website, blog, and social media accounts. Get placed ahead of your competition. You can update and complete your profile for free.
